law.text: When used in this chapter, the terms "intentionally," "knowingly," "wantonly," and "recklessly," including but not limited to equivalent terms such as "with intent," shall have the same definition and the same principles shall apply to their use as those terms are defined and used in KRS Chapter 501.
law.history: Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 150, sec. 8, effective June 20, 2005.
